languages.text: "Он почти заставил меня поверить в то, что я — чудовище. Чудовище бы не пошло с вами. Если я пойду — докажу, что он ошибся. Ваша Светлость, я принимаю ваше предложение вернуться на службу. Пусть и временную. Позвольте мне проследовать к полю боя первым".

"He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."
languages.original_text: "Он почти заставил меня поверить в то, что я — чудовище. Чудовище бы не пошло с вами. Если я пойду — докажу, что он ошибся. Ваша Светлость, я принимаю ваше предложение вернуться на службу. Пусть и временную. Позвольте мне проследовать к полю боя первым".

traits.locale_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more. As short as that service may be."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Il a presque réussi à me convaincre que j'étais un monstre. Un monstre ne vous suivrait pas. Si je vous accompagne, je lui prouverai qu'il avait tort. Votre Seigneurie, j'accepte de rejoindre vos rangs une nouvelle fois... même si je risque de ne pouvoir y rester que peu de temps. Permettez-moi de mener la charge sur le champ de bataille. »
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: « Il a presque réussi à me convaincre que j'étais un monstre. Un monstre ne vous suivrait pas. Si je vous accompagne, je lui prouverai qu'il avait tort. Votre Seigneurie, j'accepte de rejoindre vos rangs une nouvelle fois. Même si je risque de ne pouvoir y rester que peu de temps. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “他差点就说服了我，让我以为自己是个怪物。如果我真的是怪物，那我是不会跟您回去的。我会证明他说错了，大人。我愿意接受您的邀请，再次为您服务……虽然我恐怕未必能活得太久。请允许我率先加入战局吧。”
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: “他差点就说服了我，让我以为自己是个怪物。如果我真的是怪物，那我是不会跟您回去的。我会证明他说错了，大人。我愿意接受您的邀请，再次为您服务，虽然我恐怕未必能活得太久。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「奴のせいで、あぶなく自分が怪物だと思わさせられるところでした。怪物ならば、あなたのところへ戻ったりしない。しかし戻れば奴の鼻をあかせるでしょう。閣下、あなたに今一度お仕えするという申し出をお受けいたします…たとえ短いご奉仕になろうとも。私に先陣を切らせていただけないでしょうか」
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: 「奴のせいで、あぶなく自分が怪物だと思わさせられるところでした。怪物ならば、あなたのところへ戻ったりしない。しかし戻れば奴の鼻をあかせるでしょう。閣下、あなたに今一度お仕えするという申し出をお受けいたします…たとえ短いご奉仕になろうとも。私に先陣を切らせていただけないでしょうか」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Er hatte mich fast davon überzeugt, dass ich ein Monster bin. Ein Monster würde Euch nicht folgen. Wenn ich mitkomme, beweise ich ihm das Gegenteil. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich nehme Euer Angebot an und werde mich erneut in Euren Dienst stellen ... so kurz dieser Dienst auch sein mag. Bitte gestattet mir, mich zuerst ins Getümmel zu stürzen."
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: "Er hatte mich fast davon überzeugt, dass ich ein Monster bin. Ein Monster würde Euch nicht folgen. Wenn ich mitkomme, beweise ich ihm das Gegenteil. Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich nehme Euer Angebot an und werde mich erneut in Euren Dienst stellen. Auch wenn dieser nur kurz ausfallen mag."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «El amo casi me había convencido de que yo era un monstruo. Y un monstruo no le seguiría a usted. Si voy, demostraré que se equivocaba. Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepto su oferta de servirl{mf|e|a} una vez más... por breve que sea mi servicio. Permítame entrar al combate antes que usted».
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: «El amo casi me había convencido de que yo era un monstruo. Y un monstruo no le seguiría a usted. Si voy, demostraré que se equivocaba. Mi{mf|lord|lady}, acepto su oferta de servirle una vez más. Por breve que sea mi servicio».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Beni canavar olduğuma neredeyse ikna etmişti. Bir canavar, sizin peşinizden gelmezdi. Gidersem onu haksız çıkarmış olurum. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izin verin de bir kere daha size hizmet edeyim... Hizmetim kısa da sürse... Bırakın da önden ben gideyim."
languages.original_text: "He had almost convinced me that I was a monster. A monster would not follow you back. If I go, I will prove him wrong. Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I accept your offer to enter your service once more... as short as that service may be. Please allow me to enter the fray first."

traits.locale_text: "Beni canavar olduğuma neredeyse ikna etmişti. Bir canavar, sizin peşinizden gelmezdi. Gidersem onu haksız çıkarmış olurum. {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, izin verin de bir kere daha size hizmet edeyim... Hizmetim kısa da sürse... Bırakın da önden ben gideyim."
traits.speaker: WrackServant
